verse.name: c1
verse.lines: Be like Jesus, this my song, newline In the home and in the throng; newline Be like Jesus, all day long! newline I would be like Jesus.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Earthly pleasures vainly call me; newline I would be like Jesus; newline Nothing worldly shall enthrall me; newline I would be like Jesus.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: He has broken ev'ry fetter, newline I would be like Jesus; newline That my soul may serve Him better, newline I would be like Jesus.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: All the way from earth to glory, newline I would be like Jesus; newline Telling o'er and o'er the story, newline I would be like Jesus.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: That in heaven He may meet me, newline I would be like Jesus; newline That His words "Well done," may greet me, newline I would be like Jesus.
